hero.title: BUILD ON US.
hero.subtitle: We combine all our experience in one place to create convenience for you. With a reliable and practical approach, our new platform provides easy access to leading solutions and inspires you to succeed in any field.

experience.title: Diverse Applications, Limitless Experience
experience.text: At Knauf, our innovations begin with understanding your needs. With advanced know-how and creativity, we develop game-changing solutions that exceed industry standards. Pushing the boundaries of what's possible, we offer a wide range of materials suitable for every aspect of your project - from floors and ceilings to walls, roofs, and facades. Our skilled teams ensure the highest level of performance in fire resistance, energy efficiency, sustainability, and more - enabling you to achieve any goal.

sustainability.title: Creating Sustainable Homes for Tomorrow
sustainability.text: The family- and globally-managed Knauf Group is a leading supplier of reliable building materials that simplifies every stage of construction, offering comprehensive solutions and ensuring quality assurance. Our well-known brands are present in more than 90 countries, with 80 raw material processing plants and 300 production sites. Under the leadership of Alexander Knauf, JÃ¶rg Kampmeyer, and Dr. Uwe Knotzer, we continue to expand our sustainable product portfolio, implemented by over 40,000 dedicated employees worldwide.

future.title: Building the Future
future.subtitle: Based on 90 years of experience in the production of building materials, we respond to modern construction challenges with innovative products, reliable partnership, and global presence.

technical.title: Simplifying Complex Technical Information
technical.text: At any stage of the construction process, we aim to reduce your technical complexities and give you the confidence to build. To support you, we make our premium solutions easy to understand, select, and install. Our resource assortment includes product information packages, fire safety documents, modern test certificates, and digital tools for easy selection of the right materials.

cta.title: By ordering cement from the manufacturer, you protect yourself from counterfeits and are guaranteed to receive a high-quality product!

footer.address: Tashkent city, Almazar district, street, Sebzor, 22A
